resources.string: If you are a registered participant in the study, you may log in using your personal Spotify account credentials on the following screen. If you are not currently officially registered with the study, you will not be able to log in or use this application. If you have any questions, comments, or concerned, please tap the Help button below.
You have successfully logged in. Tap the button below to continue.
You do not appear to be registered to participate in this study. Please contact an administrator for assistance.

To do so, simply manipulate the slider on the right by moving the circle up or down. The higher you move the circle, the worse the pain you are experiencing is. When you are ready, set the slider according to how you feel right now. Then, press the button below to continue.
Did you take a dose of your prescribed medication?
That concludes this session. Please tap the button below to logout.
